name: Dream World
description:
"Welcome to the dream world, my child... The world is in danger... The dreams of mankind are colliding with the real world... You're the one, you and your friends, who can stop this disaster... Unleash the true power of a Xenos Knight... Unleash the power of the Sand Seller !"

Follow Shaun, Ella and the Pr.Vagurvitz in a dream-like adventure. Explore the four zones of the dream world, find the lunar keys, defeat the evil lurking in there and repair the barrier.

Dream World is a 2D RPG inspired from many games like Kingdom Hearts or Final Fantasy. For the moment, only a demo is available, giving you a taste of the story and gameplay.
